::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-sm-8}

I recently completed my Ph.D. in demography from the [Université de Montréal (Canada)](https://demo.umontreal.ca/accueil/).
My research interests include the study of international migration and immigrant integration, ethnoracial diversity, health indicators and gender inequalities. 

Methodologically, I primarily rely on machine learning applications for survey data and text data, and more, bibliometric analysis, natural language processing (NLP), large language models (LLMs), generative AI for NLP, with a strong focus on applying AI to address causal inference questions. 

I also have an active interest in advanced statistical methods (structural equation modeling and time series methods), observational data for modeling and understanding demographic outcomes.
